participant_1.background:
My parents are very supportive of my interests, even if they don't always understand them.
I'd rather read my horoscope and write my own poems, thank you very much.
I don't mind my family, but we don't have a lot in common.
I like to go to museums on the weekend to learn new things and experience different cultures.
I am proud of my long curly hair, and the fact that I own a home.

participant_2.background:
I am of mixed race and I am proud of my heritage.
I keep my blue and hazel eyes open and take mental notes of the world around me.
I collect cosplay props to bring my favorite characters to life.
My family is important to me, and I like to share stories about them with my children.
I'm struggling with school but I'm happy with my family.

content.text: Hey how's it going? I'm interested to hear about your interests.
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I'm a huge fan of cosplay and I love to bring my favorite characters to life.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to try cosplay but I'm not very crafty.
You don't have to be crafty to cosplay! There are a lot of great resources online that can help you get started.
That's good to know! I'll have to check them out.
I'm sure you'd be great at it. I love to share stories about my cosplays with my kids.
That's sweet. I'm glad you have a supportive family.
Thanks, me too. I'm mixed race and I'm proud of my heritage.
That's great! I'm proud of my heritage too.
I'm half Irish and half Italian.
Oh, that's cool! I'm half white and half black.
That's a great mix. I bet you have a lot of interesting stories to tell.
Yeah, I do. I love sharing them with my kids
